data.title: Mrs. Tarynn VanderHoek â€“ Lynden Christian School
data.text:
I am a graduate of Lynden Christian (class of 2014), and I received my teaching degree from Dordt College in Elementary Education in 2018.My husband Paul and I live in Lynden. We are members of New Song Church in Bellingham, and we enjoy the opportunities we have to serve there.

I love being back at Lynden Christian and find it a huge privilege to be working here. I want my students to know that they are loved by God, they are created in His image, and they are a part of His plan.

Outside of school I enjoy hiking, biking, going camping, road tripping, and spending quality time with the people I love!
